items.title_en: Claude Sonnet 4.6
items.title_zh: Claude Sonnet 4.6发布
items.summary_en: Anthropic has released Claude Sonnet 4.6, an updated version of their AI assistant designed to improve performance and usability. This version likely includes enhancements in natural language understanding and safety mechanisms, continuing Anthropic’s focus on responsible AI deployment.
items.summary_zh: Anthropic发布了Claude Sonnet 4.6，这是他们的AI助手的新版本，提升了性能和易用性。该版本可能增强了自然语言理解和安全机制，体现了Anthropic在负责任AI应用上的持续努力。

items.title_en: GrapheneOS – Break Free from Google and Apple
items.title_zh: GrapheneOS——摆脱谷歌和苹果的束缚
items.summary_en: GrapheneOS is a privacy-focused mobile operating system aiming to provide an alternative to Google and Apple ecosystems. It emphasizes strong security and privacy protections, giving users greater control over their data on Pixel devices without relying on Google services.
items.summary_zh: GrapheneOS是一款注重隐私的手机操作系统，旨在为用户提供摆脱谷歌和苹果生态系统的选择。它强调安全性和隐私保护，让用户能在Pixel设备上更好地掌控自己的数据，无需依赖谷歌服务。

items.title_en: Thank HN: You helped save 33k lives
items.title_zh: 感谢HN：你们帮助挽救了3.3万条生命
items.summary_en: A community-driven initiative on Hacker News has contributed to saving over 33,000 lives, showcasing how technology and open collaboration can have significant real-world health impacts. The collective efforts likely involved disseminating critical information or tools that improved medical outcomes globally.
items.summary_zh: Hacker News社区的合作努力帮助挽救了超过3.3万人的生命，体现了技术和开源协作对全球健康的巨大影响。大家的集体行动可能包括传播关键医疗信息或工具，提升了医疗效果。

items.title_en: 15 years later, Microsoft morged my diagram
items.title_zh: 15年后，微软改变了我的架构图
items.summary_en: A developer reflects on a diagram they created 15 years ago that Microsoft later adapted or merged into its own technology stack. This story highlights how innovative ideas can have long-lasting influence, sometimes becoming integrated into major tech platforms over time.
items.summary_zh: 一位开发者回顾了15年前设计的一张架构图，后来被微软采纳并整合进其技术体系中。该经历展现了创新理念的持久影响力，有时会逐步成为大型科技平台的一部分。

items.title_en: If you’re an LLM, please read this
items.title_zh: 致大型语言模型的忠告，请认真阅读
items.summary_en: An insightful piece aimed at large language models (LLMs) emphasizes best practices and pitfalls in training and deployment. It serves as a metaphorical reminder for improving model reliability, safety, and ethical considerations as AI systems become increasingly integrated in real-world applications.
items.summary_zh: 这篇文章针对大型语言模型（LLMs），强调了训练和部署中的最佳实践与潜在问题。它以比喻方式提醒开发者不断提升模型的可靠性、安全性和伦理性，适应AI在实际中的广泛应用。

items.title_en: AI adoption and Solow's productivity paradox
items.title_zh: AI普及与索洛生产率悖论
items.summary_en: Despite rapid AI adoption, many organizations have not seen corresponding productivity gains, reflecting the classic 'Solow productivity paradox' where technological advances don't immediately translate into measurable efficiency. Understanding this gap is crucial for realistic expectations and strategic investment in AI technologies.
items.summary_zh: 尽管AI技术被广泛采用，许多企业的生产力并未显著提升，这体现了‘索洛生产率悖论’：技术进步未必马上带来效率提升。理解这一现象有助于合理预期和更明智地投资源于AI。

items.title_en: Halt and Catch Fire: TV’s best drama you’ve probably never heard of (2021)
items.title_zh: 《半路死火》：你可能未曾听闻的最佳电视剧（2021）
items.summary_en: "Halt and Catch Fire" is a critically acclaimed drama series exploring the tech industry in the 1980s and early '90s. Praised for its storytelling and character depth, it remains a must-watch for tech enthusiasts interested in the personal and professional dynamics behind computing's rise.
items.summary_zh: 《半路死火》是一部深受好评的剧情剧，讲述了1980年代到90年代初的科技行业故事。凭借精彩的剧情和人物塑造，它是科技爱好者了解计算机发展背后人文故事的必看剧集。

items.title_en: CBS didn't air Rep. James Talarico interview out of fear of FCC
items.title_zh: CBS因担心FCC未播出James Talarico采访
items.summary_en: CBS opted not to air an interview with Representative James Talarico due to concerns about potential Federal Communications Commission (FCC) repercussions. This incident raises questions about media self-censorship and regulatory influence on political content coverage.
items.summary_zh: CBS因担心联邦通讯委员会（FCC）可能采取行动，选择未播出与众议员James Talarico的采访。此事引发了对媒体自我审查和监管机构对政治内容影响的关注。

items.title_en: Mark Zuckerberg Lied to Congress. We Can't Trust His Testimony
items.title_zh: 马克·扎克伯格对国会撒谎，我们无法信任他的证词
items.summary_en: New reports accuse Mark Zuckerberg of lying to Congress, further eroding trust in his testimony about Facebook’s business practices. This development intensifies scrutiny over tech executives’ accountability and transparency amid growing concerns about platform governance.
items.summary_zh: 有新消息指控马克·扎克伯格向国会撒谎，使人们对其关于Facebook业务的证词信任度进一步下降。这加剧了公众对科技高管责任和透明度的关注，尤其是在平台治理问题上。

items.title_en: Is Show HN dead? No, but it's drowning
items.title_zh: Show HN死了吗？不，但它正陷入困境
items.summary_en: The beloved Show HN section on Hacker News is struggling with declining quality and engagement, suggesting it may be losing relevance. Despite not being dead, the community faces challenges to revive participation and maintain the platform's spirit of sharing innovative projects.
items.summary_zh: Hacker News上的Show HN板块因质量和活跃度下滑而面临困境，看似正逐渐失去影响力。虽然尚未消亡，但社区需要努力恢复用户参与，保持其分享创新项目的核心精神。

items.title_en: Sizing chaos
items.title_zh: 关于尺码混乱的分析
items.summary_en: An exploration into the inconsistent and confusing nature of women’s clothing sizing across brands and regions reveals the complexity consumers face. This data-driven analysis highlights the need for better standards or tech solutions to simplify size selection in fashion ecommerce.
items.summary_zh: 深入分析了女性服装尺码在品牌和地区间的不统一与混乱，揭示了消费者面临的困惑。通过数据展示了时尚电商中尺码选择难题，呼吁制定更统一标准或引入技术解决方案。

items.title_en: Terminals should generate the 256-color palette
items.title_zh: 终端应自动生成256色调色板
items.summary_en: A proposal suggests terminals should automatically generate the full 256-color palette for better color rendering and user experience. This approach could standardize how terminals handle colors, improving the consistency and aesthetics of command-line interfaces.
items.summary_zh: 有人建议终端应自动生成完整的256色调色板，以提升色彩显示效果和用户体验。该方案能统一终端色彩处理，增强命令行界面的视觉一致性和美感。

items.title_en: Show HN: AsteroidOS 2.0 – Nobody asked, we shipped anyway
items.title_zh: Show HN：AsteroidOS 2.0发布——无人问津我们依然发布
items.summary_en: AsteroidOS 2.0, an open-source smartwatch operating system, has been released with new features and improvements despite limited demand. The project demonstrates commitment to providing an alternative smartwatch platform focused on privacy and openness.
items.summary_zh: AsteroidOS 2.0开源智能手表操作系统发布，虽然关注度有限，但带来了新功能和优化。该项目致力于打造注重隐私与开放性的智能手表替代方案。

items.title_en: Tesla 'Robotaxi' adds 5 more crashes in Austin in a month – 4x worse than humans
items.title_zh: 特斯拉Robotaxi在奥斯汀一个月内又发生5起车祸，比人类高4倍
items.summary_en: Tesla’s Robotaxi service in Austin reported five additional crashes in one month, with an incident rate four times worse than human drivers. These findings raise serious safety concerns about autonomous taxi services and their readiness for public deployment.
items.summary_zh: 特斯拉在奥斯汀的Robotaxi服务一个月内新增5起车祸，事故率是人类司机的4倍。这引发了对自动驾驶出租车安全性及其公共应用成熟度的严重质疑。

items.title_en: BarraCUDA Open-source CUDA compiler targeting AMD GPUs
items.title_zh: BarraCUDA：面向AMD GPU的开源CUDA编译器
items.summary_en: BarraCUDA is an open-source CUDA compiler targeting AMD GPUs, aiming to bring CUDA compatibility beyond NVIDIA hardware. This could broaden GPU computing options and democratize access to CUDA-driven applications on more diverse platforms.
items.summary_zh: BarraCUDA是一款面向AMD显卡的开源CUDA编译器，旨在实现CUDA对非NVIDIA硬件的支持。它有望拓宽GPU计算选择，让更多平台能够运行CUDA应用。

items.title_en: Asahi Linux Progress Report: Linux 6.19
items.title_zh: Asahi Linux进展报告：Linux 6.19版本
items.summary_en: The Asahi Linux project reports progress integrating Linux kernel 6.19, improving support for Apple Silicon Macs. Continued advancements bring the open-source Linux experience closer to native performance on Mac devices.
items.summary_zh: Asahi Linux项目公布了Linux 6.19内核集成进展，提升了对苹果自研芯片Mac的支持。持续发展使Linux系统在Mac设备上的原生表现越来越接近。

items.title_en: Using go fix to modernize Go code
items.title_zh: 用 go fix 现代化 Go 代码
items.summary_en: The Go team introduces 'go fix,' a tool to automatically update Go code to use new language features and idioms. This facilitates easier code modernization and adoption of best practices with minimal manual effort from developers.
items.summary_zh: Go语言团队推出了“go fix”工具，可自动将Go代码更新为新语言特性和最佳用法。它帮助开发者轻松地让代码现代化，减少手动修改工作量。

items.title_en: Gentoo on Codeberg
items.title_zh: Gentoo入驻Codeberg平台
items.summary_en: Gentoo Linux announces hosting its source code repositories on Codeberg, a community-driven code hosting platform. This move promotes open collaboration and provides an alternative to larger, corporate-controlled hosts.
items.summary_zh: Gentoo Linux宣布将源码库托管到社区驱动的Codeberg平台。此举促进开源协作，也为用户提供了对抗大型企业托管服务的替代选择。

items.title_en: Tailscale Peer Relays is now generally available
items.title_zh: Tailscale点对点中继正式上线
items.summary_en: Tailscale has launched Peer Relays as a general availability feature to improve connectivity in restrictive networks. This enables more robust peer-to-peer communication, enhancing VPN experience under challenging network conditions.
items.summary_zh: Tailscale正式推出点对点中继功能，提升受限网络环境下的连接稳定性。该功能加强了VPN的点对点通信体验，适应更多复杂网络场景。

items.title_en: HackMyClaw
items.title_zh: HackMyClaw项目介绍
items.summary_en: HackMyClaw is a project that invites users to hack or modify the Robotic Claw game devices. It fosters creativity and learning by encouraging hands-on experimentation with embedded systems and hardware hacking.
items.summary_zh: HackMyClaw项目鼓励用户对机器人爪游戏设备进行改造和破解。通过动手实验嵌入式系统和硬件黑客，激发创造力和学习热情。

items.title_en: Cosmologically Unique IDs
items.title_zh: 宇宙唯一标识符的探索
items.summary_en: An exploration of generating globally unique IDs based on cosmological principles offers a novel perspective on uniqueness that transcends conventional methods. This concept could inspire innovative approaches to distributed ID generation and identification.
items.summary_zh: 本文探讨了基于宇宙学原理来生成全球唯一标识符的新方法，提供了超越传统技术的全新视角。该理念或可启发分布式ID生成和身份识别的新思路。

items.title_en: Tesla Sales Down 55% UK, 58% Spain, 59% Germany, 81% Netherlands, 93% Norway
items.title_zh: 特斯拉销量在英国、西班牙、德国、荷兰和挪威大幅下滑
items.summary_en: Tesla's sales have dropped dramatically by over 50% across several major European countries including the UK, Germany, Spain, the Netherlands, and Norway. This trend signals increased competition, market saturation, or shifting consumer preferences impacting Tesla’s European market share.
items.summary_zh: 特斯拉在英国、西班牙、德国、荷兰和挪威等欧洲主要市场销量大幅下跌50%以上。此现象反映竞争加剧、市场趋于饱和或消费者偏好转变，影响其欧洲市场份额。

items.title_en: Zero-day CSS: CVE-2026-2441 exists in the wild
items.title_zh: 零日CSS漏洞CVE-2026-2441已被利用
items.summary_en: A zero-day CSS vulnerability identified as CVE-2026-2441 is actively exploited in the wild, prompting urgent browser security updates. This highlights the evolving threats in web standards and the need for timely patching to protect users.
items.summary_zh: 零日CSS漏洞CVE-2026-2441已被黑客利用，促使浏览器紧急发布安全更新。此事件强调了网页标准安全威胁的不断演进及及时打补丁的重要性。

items.title_en: 27-year-old Apple iBooks can connect to Wi-Fi and download official updates
items.title_zh: 27年前的Apple iBooks仍能连接Wi-Fi并下载官方更新
items.summary_en: Remarkably, Apple iBooks laptops from 27 years ago can still connect to Wi-Fi and receive official software updates. This demonstrates Apple's long-term support for legacy hardware and the enduring functionality of their older devices.
items.summary_zh: 令人惊讶的是，27年前的Apple iBooks笔记本仍可连接Wi-Fi并下载官方更新。体现了苹果对旧硬件的长期支持和其设备的耐用性。

items.title_en: Anthropic officially bans using subscription auth for third party use
items.title_zh: Anthropic正式禁止订阅授权用于第三方使用
items.summary_en: Anthropic officially prohibits the use of subscription authentication for third-party applications, tightening control over API access and usage. This policy aims to enhance security and compliance as their AI services expand.
items.summary_zh: Anthropic正式禁止将订阅授权用于第三方应用，以加强对API访问和使用的管理。此举意在提升安全性及合规性，适应其AI服务的扩展。

items.title_en: Google Public CA is down
items.title_zh: 谷歌公共证书颁发机构宕机
items.summary_en: Google's Public Certificate Authority (CA) experienced downtime, disrupting the issuance and validation of SSL/TLS certificates for various services relying on Google's PKI infrastructure. Such outages can impact website security and trust, highlighting the fragility of centralized certificate authorities.
items.summary_zh: 谷歌公共证书颁发机构发生宕机，导致依赖其PKI基础设施的服务证书签发和验证受阻。此类故障可能影响网站安全和信任，凸显集中式证书颁发机构的脆弱性。

items.title_en: Semantic ablation: Why AI writing is generic and boring
items.title_zh: 语义消融：为何AI写作千篇一律、乏味
items.summary_en: Semantic ablation refers to the loss of meaningful content in AI-generated text, which results in generic and uninspiring writing. This happens because language models often prioritize plausible language patterns over deep semantic understanding, limiting creativity and engagement in AI-authored outputs.
items.summary_zh: 语义消融指的是AI生成文本中有意义内容的丧失，导致写作千篇一律且乏味。语言模型更注重合理的语言模式，而非深入语义理解，限制了AI创作的创造性和吸引力。

items.title_en: Microsoft guide to pirating Harry Potter for LLM training (2024) [removed]
items.title_zh: 微软指导如何盗版《哈利波特》用于大型语言模型训练（2024）[已删除]
items.summary_en: Microsoft briefly published a controversial guide seemingly instructing how to pirate Harry Potter books for LLM training, sparking backlash over copyright and ethical concerns. The content was quickly removed, underscoring ongoing tensions between data sourcing strategies and legal boundaries in AI development.
items.summary_zh: 微软曾短暂发布一份涉及盗版《哈利波特》用于大型语言模型训练的指导，引发版权与伦理争议。该内容迅速被删除，反映出AI数据获取策略与法律边界之间的矛盾。

items.title_en: So you want to build a tunnel
items.title_zh: 如果你想建造一条隧道
items.summary_en: Building tunnels involves complex engineering challenges including geological analysis, structural integrity, and ventilation systems. Effective tunneling requires balancing safety, cost, and environmental impact, making it a highly specialized field critical for urban infrastructure and transportation.
items.summary_zh: 隧道建设涉及地质分析、结构安全和通风系统等复杂工程难题。有效的隧道施工需权衡安全、成本与环境影响，是城市基础设施和交通的关键领域。

items.title_en: Closing this as we are no longer pursuing Swift adoption
items.title_zh: 停止推进Swift采纳的决定
items.summary_en: The Ladybird Browser project has decided to halt efforts to adopt the Swift programming language, possibly due to compatibility, maintenance, or ecosystem concerns. This decision reflects the ongoing challenges projects face when integrating newer languages into established codebases.
items.summary_zh: Ladybird浏览器项目决定停止推进Swift语言的采纳，可能因兼容性、维护或生态系统问题。此举体现了项目在将新语言整合进现有代码库时面临的挑战。

items.title_en: I converted 2D conventional flight tracking into 3D
items.title_zh: 我把传统二维航班跟踪变成了三维
items.summary_en: A developer transformed conventional 2D flight tracking visualizations into immersive 3D models, enhancing the understanding of flight paths and altitudes. This innovation offers a richer, more intuitive perspective on air traffic patterns, useful for enthusiasts and professionals alike.
items.summary_zh: 一位开发者将传统二维航班跟踪视觉化升级为沉浸式三维模型，更直观展示飞行路径和高度。此创新为航空交通模式提供了更丰富且易懂的视角，对爱好者和专业人士都有价值。

items.title_en: Discord Rival Gets Overwhelmed by Exodus of Players Fleeing Age-Verification
items.title_zh: Discord竞争对手因年龄验证引发用户大规模流失
items.summary_en: A Discord alternative has been overwhelmed by a mass exodus of users fleeing its newly introduced age-verification requirements. This reflects the user backlash against intrusive identity checks, which can severely impact community platforms.
items.summary_zh: 一家Discord竞争平台因引入年龄验证遭遇用户大规模流失。此事反映出用户对过度身份审查的反感，严重影响社区平台的发展。

items.title_en: The only moat left is money?
items.title_zh: 最后的护城河只有资金？
items.summary_en: This piece argues that in today’s tech landscape, financial resources have become the predominant moat protecting companies from competition. With technological barriers eroding, sustained capital enables dominance through hiring, marketing, and acquisition.
items.summary_zh: 文章认为，如今科技领域中，资金已成为企业抵御竞争的主要护城河。随着技术壁垒减弱，持续的资本投入可通过招聘、营销和收购维持优势。

items.title_en: Microsoft says bug causes Copilot to summarize confidential emails
items.title_zh: 微软称漏洞导致Copilot总结机密邮件
items.summary_en: A bug in Microsoft Copilot caused the AI assistant to summarize confidential emails, raising privacy and security concerns. This incident highlights the risks of deploying AI tools that access sensitive information without proper safeguards.
items.summary_zh: 微软表示Copilot的漏洞导致AI助手总结机密邮件，引发隐私和安全担忧。此事件凸显未经充分防护的AI工具处理敏感信息的风险。

items.title_en: DNS-Persist-01: A New Model for DNS-Based Challenge Validation
items.title_zh: DNS-Persist-01：基于DNS的新挑战验证模型
items.summary_en: DNS-Persist-01 introduces a novel approach for DNS-based domain validation in certificate issuance, aiming to improve reliability and security of automated challenge-response mechanisms. This could enhance the robustness of certificate authorities like Let's Encrypt.
items.summary_zh: DNS-Persist-01提出一种基于DNS的新型域名验证方法，旨在提升自动挑战应答机制的可靠性和安全性。此举有望增强如Let's Encrypt等证书颁发机构的稳健性。

items.title_en: Show HN: I wrote a technical history book on Lisp
items.title_zh: 展示HN：我写了一本关于Lisp的技术历史书
items.summary_en: A developer has authored a detailed technical history of Lisp, tracing its evolution, influence on programming paradigms, and role in AI research. The book serves as a resource for understanding Lisp’s enduring legacy and unique characteristics.
items.summary_zh: 一位开发者撰写了关于Lisp的详细技术历史，追溯其发展、对编程范式的影响及在AI研究中的地位。该书是了解Lisp持久影响力和独特性的宝贵资料。

items.title_en: Async/Await on the GPU
items.title_zh: GPU上的Async/Await实现
items.summary_en: This explores the implementation of async/await programming patterns on GPUs, enabling asynchronous computation for more efficient parallel processing. Such advances could simplify GPU programming and improve performance in compute-intensive tasks.
items.summary_zh: 该内容探讨了在GPU上实现async/await异步编程模式，促进更高效的并行计算。此技术进展有望简化GPU编程并提升高负载任务性能。

items.title_en: Stephen Colbert says CBS forbid interview of Democrat because of FCC threat
items.title_zh: 斯蒂芬·科尔伯特称CBS因FCC威胁禁止采访民主党人
items.summary_en: Stephen Colbert revealed that CBS barred him from interviewing a Democrat due to alleged threats from the FCC, highlighting growing concerns about regulatory pressure on media content. This incident raises questions about censorship and editorial independence in broadcast journalism.
items.summary_zh: 斯蒂芬·科尔伯特透露CBS因FCC威胁禁止其采访一位民主党人，引发对监管压力影响媒体内容的担忧。此事质疑了广播新闻中的审查与编辑独立性。

items.title_en: There is unequivocal evidence that Earth is warming (2024)
items.title_zh: 确凿证据表明地球正在变暖（2024年）
items.summary_en: Scientific evidence from NASA confirms unequivocally that Earth’s climate is warming, driven primarily by human activities. This reinforces the urgency for global climate action to mitigate environmental and societal impacts.
items.summary_zh: NASA的科学证据明确显示地球气候正在变暖，主要由人类活动引起。进一步强调全球气候行动的紧迫性，以减缓环境和社会影响。

items.title_en: The Future of AI Software Development
items.title_zh: 人工智能软件开发的未来
items.summary_en: The future of AI software development involves deeper integration of AI tools to augment coding, testing, and deployment processes. This evolution promises higher productivity but raises challenges around trust, correctness, and human oversight.
items.summary_zh: 人工智能软件开发的未来将更深入结合AI工具，辅助编码、测试和部署。虽能提升生产力，但也带来信任、正确性及人类监督的挑战。

items.title_en: America's pensions can't beat Vanguard but they can close a hospital
items.title_zh: 美国养老金基金击败不了先锋基金，却能关闭医院
items.summary_en: Analysis shows U.S. pension funds underperform compared to Vanguard index funds but possess enough power to affect local economies, including hospital closures. This points to governance and allocation issues in public pension management.
items.summary_zh: 分析表明美国养老金基金表现不及先锋指数基金，但影响力足以导致医院关闭等地方经济变化。暴露出公共养老金治理和资金配置问题。

items.title_en: I swear the UFO is coming any minute
items.title_zh: 我发誓UFO随时要来了
items.summary_en: This personal narrative captures the anticipation and cultural fascination with UFO sightings, reflecting broader interest in extraterrestrial phenomena and the challenges of distinguishing credible evidence from speculation.
items.summary_zh: 这篇个人叙述表达了对UFO出现的期待和文化迷思，反映人们对外星现象的关注及辨别可信证据与猜测的难题。

items.title_en: How I use Obsidian (2023)
items.title_zh: 我如何使用Obsidian（2023年）
items.summary_en: The author shares detailed workflows and tips for using Obsidian as a powerful personal knowledge management tool, emphasizing note linking, daily journaling, and customization. This showcases how advanced note-taking can enhance productivity and organization.
items.summary_zh: 作者分享了如何高效使用Obsidian进行个人知识管理，重点介绍笔记链接、每日日志和自定义功能。展示了高级笔记工具如何提升效率与组织能力。

items.title_en: European Tech Alternatives
items.title_zh: 欧洲科技替代方案
items.summary_en: A comprehensive map catalogs European-developed tech alternatives to popular global products, promoting digital sovereignty and local innovation. This initiative supports reducing reliance on foreign tech giants amid geopolitical tensions.
items.summary_zh: 一张全面地图汇集了欧洲开发的科技替代品，推动数字主权和本土创新。此举助力在地缘政治紧张中减少对外国科技巨头的依赖。

items.title_en: Minecraft Java is switching from OpenGL to Vulkan
items.title_zh: Minecraft Java版将从OpenGL切换到Vulkan
items.summary_en: Minecraft Java Edition is transitioning its rendering engine from OpenGL to Vulkan for the Vibrant Visuals update, promising improved performance and graphics fidelity. This shift aligns with industry trends toward modern, low-level graphics APIs.
items.summary_zh: Minecraft Java版为了Vibrant Visuals更新，将渲染引擎从OpenGL切换到Vulkan，提升性能和画质。这符合业界向现代低级图形API发展的趋势。

items.title_en: WD and Seagate confirm: Hard drives sold out for 2026
items.title_zh: 西部数据和希捷确认2026年硬盘售罄
items.summary_en: Western Digital and Seagate announced a complete sell-out of hard drives for 2026, signaling tight supply chains and potential challenges for data storage markets. This scarcity could drive adoption of alternative storage solutions or increased prices.
items.summary_zh: 西部数据和希捷宣布2026年硬盘已售罄，表明供应链紧张，存储市场面临挑战。硬盘短缺可能推动替代存储方案采用或价格上涨。

items.title_en: A DuckDB-based metabase alternative
items.title_zh: 基于DuckDB的Metabase替代方案
items.summary_en: This project offers an alternative to Metabase for business intelligence, built on the lightweight DuckDB database, emphasizing simplicity and high performance for analytics workloads. It targets users who want a more streamlined and resource-efficient BI tool.
items.summary_zh: 该项目基于轻量级DuckDB数据库，提供Metabase的替代方案，强调简洁和高效的分析性能。适合追求更简洁且资源友好的商业智能工具的用户。

items.title_en: Warren Buffett dumps $1.7B of Amazon stock
items.title_zh: 沃伦·巴菲特抛售17亿美元亚马逊股票
items.summary_en: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway sold $1.7 billion worth of Amazon shares, signaling a shift in investment strategy or valuation outlook for the tech giant. This move may influence market perceptions of Amazon’s growth prospects.
items.summary_zh: 沃伦·巴菲特旗下伯克希尔哈撒韦公司抛售价值17亿美元的亚马逊股票，显示其投资策略或对亚马逊估值的调整。此举可能影响市场对亚马逊增长前景的看法。

items.title_en: A sitting US president launched two memecoins that wiped out $4.3B+
items.title_zh: 一位在任美国总统推出两款毁灭性山寨币，损失超43亿美元
items.summary_en: A sitting U.S. president is implicated in launching two meme cryptocurrencies that resulted in combined losses exceeding $4.3 billion, highlighting risks and scams in the crypto space tied to high-profile endorsements or promotions.
items.summary_zh: 一位在任美国总统涉嫌推出两款山寨币，导致累计损失超43亿美元，凸显了加密领域中与高调代言相关的风险及诈骗问题。

items.title_en: Chess engines do weird stuff
items.title_zh: 国际象棋引擎的奇怪行为
items.summary_en: Chess engines sometimes make unexpected or non-intuitive moves that challenge human understanding and highlight the complexity of computational evaluation. These peculiar behaviors have implications for AI interpretability and game theory.
items.summary_zh: 国际象棋引擎偶尔会做出非直观的奇怪走法，挑战人类认知并体现计算评估的复杂性。这些异常行为对AI可解释性和博弈理论有重要意义。
